trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 요소에 대 한 기본 클래스를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework supplies two specialized classes that derive from DataGridViewElement: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>, which represents individual elements, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>, which represents a series of grouped subelements.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewElement에서 파생 되는 두 가지 특수 한 클래스를 제공 하는.NET Framework: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>, 개별 요소를 나타내는 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>을 일련의 그룹화 된 하위 요소를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A>속성을 `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 이 요소와 연결 된 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control that contains this element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 이 요소를 포함 하는 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when the element is associated with a different <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 요소를 다른와 연결 될 때 호출 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentDoubleClick"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentDoubleClick"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user interface (UI) state of the element.
trans-unit.target: 요소의 사용자 인터페이스 (UI) 상태를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The states specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> values are enforced by the UI but may be programmatically overruled.
trans-unit.target: 으로 지정 된 상태는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates>값은 UI에 의해 적용 되지만 프로그래밍 방식으로 재정의 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values representing the state.
trans-unit.target: 비트 조합 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> 상태를 나타내는 값입니다.
